title: Christmas With Cheeky Goblin
description: Cheeky Goblin has managed to cause mayhem on Christmas day, AGAIN! He has slipped dancing potion in Gran`s drink, Grandad had itching powder in his underpants and he has Cheeky Goblin´d poor Kwame. You just won´t be able to put this book down.
author: Esinu Afele
